mapper.select: SELECT * FROM event ORDER BY even_code DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT even_code ,even_codename ,even_guname ,even_title ,even_date ,even_place ,even_org_name ,even_use_trgt ,even_use_fee ,even_player ,even_program ,even_etc_desc ,even_org_link ,even_main_img ,even_rgst_date ,even_ticket ,even_strt_date ,even_end_date ,even_theme_code FROM event WHERE date_format(even_strt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= CURDATE() AND date_format(even_end_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= CURDATE() ORDER BY even_strt_date ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
